My name is Octavia, and I’m a Developer Evangelist at Toptal. We’re an online marketplace for software developers, with one important difference: our screening process means that we only accepts the top 3% of applicants.

I wondered whether you could take a look at this 10 common Nodejs mistakes www.toptal.com/nodejs/top-10-common-nodejs-developer-mistakes. We would love to get some feedback on it or do feel free to share if you think people will find it useful!

I’m really interested in building relationships with like-minded people so do please get in contact if you are interested in our content partners scheme.

Regards,
